subdisciplines.name: Soil Biology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the microbial and faunal life present in soil and their interactions with the physical and chemical properties of soil.

subdisciplines.name: Soil Chemistry
subdisciplines.description: The study of the chemical composition and reactions of soils.

subdisciplines.name: Soil Physics
subdisciplines.description: The study of the physical properties of soils, including the water flow, gas exchange, and heat transfer.
